name: rossmann-store-sales
data_intro: Forecast sales using store, promotion, and competitor data

cat_feature_intro.StoreType: differentiates between 4 different store models: a, b, c, d
cat_feature_intro.Assortment: describes an assortment level: a = basic, b = extra, c = extended
cat_feature_intro.PromoInterval: describes the consecutive intervals Promo2 is started, naming the months the promotion is started anew. E.g. 'Feb,May,Aug,Nov' means each round starts in February, May, August, November of any given year for that store
cat_feature_intro.StateHoliday: indicates a state holiday. Normally all stores, with few exceptions, are closed on state holidays. Note that all schools are closed on public holidays and weekends. a = public holiday, b = Easter holiday, c = Christmas, 0 = None
cat_feature_intro.Promo2: Promo2 is a continuing and consecutive promotion for some stores: 0 = store is not participating, 1 = store is participating
cat_feature_intro.Promo: indicates whether a store is running a promo on that day
cat_feature_intro.Id: an Id that represents a (Store, Date) duple within the test set

num_feature_intro.Sales: the turnover for any given day (this is what you are predicting)
num_feature_intro.Store: a unique Id for each store
num_feature_intro.CompetitionDistance: distance in meters to the nearest competitor store
num_feature_intro.CompetitionOpenSinceMonth: gives the approximate month of the time the nearest competitor was opened
num_feature_intro.CompetitionOpenSinceYear: gives the approximate year of the time the nearest competitor was opened
num_feature_intro.Promo2SinceWeek: describes calendar week when the store started participating in Promo2
num_feature_intro.Promo2SinceYear: describes the year when the store started participating in Promo2
num_feature_intro.DayOfWeek: gives the day of the week (Monday, Tuesday, etc.)
num_feature_intro.Open: an indicator for whether the store was open: 0 = closed, 1 = open
num_feature_intro.SchoolHoliday: indicates if the (Store, Date) was affected by the closure of public schools
num_feature_intro.Customers: the number of customers on a given day
